definitions.definition: A plait or fold in cloth, made by drawing a thread through it; a pucker .
The inclination forward of the axle journals to keep the wheels from working outward.
The soffit or under surface of the masonry required in gathering. See gather#verb .
A blob of molten glass collected on the end of a blowpipe .

main_definition: A plait or fold in cloth, made by drawing a thread through it; a pucker .
secondary_definitions: The inclination forward of the axle journals to keep the wheels from working outward.
( masonry ) The soffit or under surface of the masonry required in gathering. See gather#verb .
( glassblowing ) A blob of molten glass collected on the end of a blowpipe .
